Class-Fighter 20 -- Female Skilled Human Fighter: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +4
Background: Fortune Teller Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19973/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes: Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)

Human Heritage: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 10 from any)
Weapon Legend: 1 selection
Adopted Ancestry (Elf): Can take Elf ancestry feats
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Accounting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Genealogy Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +26 (charisma; trained)
Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Halfling Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Plains Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Heaven Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Architecture Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Heraldry Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Sailing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Astronomy Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Intimidation: +4 (charisma; untrained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +28 (strength; expert) Library Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stabling Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary)
Butchering Lore: +34 (intelligence; %1) Magnimar Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Cooking Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Military Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Tea Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Additional Lore (Astronomy Lore): Skill Legendary (Astronomy Lore)

Additional Lore (Stabling Lore): Skill Legendary (Stabling Lore)
Battlefield Surveyor: Perception Master
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 7 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Cooking Lore): Skill Trained (Cooking Lore)
Skill Training (Heaven Lore): Skill Trained (Heaven Lore)
Skill Training (Magnimar Lore): Skill Trained (Magnimar Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Dubious Knowledge: Normal failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gains +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (2 max); master) Class DC: Fighter: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Greatclub (+32 1d10+4 B; strength; legendary); Lesser Acid Flask (+32 1 E R20'; dexterity; legendary); Sawtooth Saber (+32 1d6+4 S; strength; legendary); Warhammer (+32 1d8+4 B; strength; legendary)
Combat Notes:
Advanced Weapon Training (Swords): Weapon Familiarity (Swords)
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fighter Expertise: Class Expert (Fighter)
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Clubs): Attack Master (Simple Clubs; Martial Clubs)/Attack Expert (Advanced Clubs)
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Improved Flexibility: Has increased Combat Flexibility effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Ultimate Flexibility: Has increased Combat Flexibility effects
Unconventional Weaponry (Dogslicer): Weapon Familiarity (Dogslicer)
Versatile Legend: Attack Legendary (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Master (Advanced Weapons)/Class Master (Fighter)
Weapon Legend (Clubs): Attack Legendary (Simple Clubs; Martial Clubs)/Attack Master (Advanced Clubs)
Weapon Legend: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Expert (Advanced Weapons)
Weapon Proficiency (Dwarven Waraxe): Attack Expert (Dwarven Waraxe)
Advantageous Assault: (1) Strike on a grabbed, prone, or restrained foe inflicts additional damage equal to the number of damage dice, +2 HP if wielded two-handed, even on failure
Aggressive Block: (F) Shield Block moves foe 5' or inflicts off-guard (foe's choice)
Agile Grace: Reduces multiple attack penalties with agile weapons to -3 and -6
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Assisting Shot: (1) Successful ranged Strike gives the next ally attack on the target +1 attack, or +2 with a critical success, until the start of the next turn
Barreling Charge: (2) Successful Athletics vs. Fortitude allows Striding through foes' spaces to make a melee Strike
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Blade Brake: (R) Negates the triggering forced move of less than 20', or reduces a longer forced move to 5'
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Boundless Reprisals: Gives an additional reaction to use a fighter feat or class feature once per foe turn
Brutal Finish: (1) Ends the turn with a two-handed melee Strike that inflicts 2 additional damage dice, even on failure
Brutish Shove: (1) Two-handed melee Strike inflicts off-guard until the end of the turn; success also allows an automatic Shove
Certain Strike: (1) Melee Strike inflicts normal non-dice damage on failure
Combat Assessment: (1) Melee Strike allows an immediate Recall Knowledge about the target; a critical hit gives a +2 bonus
Combat Flexibility: Gains 1 chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level, 1 of up to 14th level, and 1 of up to 18th level during daily prep; can use 1 hr training to change selections
Combat Grab: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts grabbed until the end of the next turn or until the target Escapes
Crashing Slam: Slam Down automatically inflicts a critical Trip, and using a two-handed weapon causes the Trip to inflict damage based on the weapon damage die size
Cut From The Air: (R) Gives +4 AC vs. the triggering ranged attack
Dashing Strike: (1) Makes a melee Strike on a foe after Striding away from another
Dazing Blow: (1) Successful melee Strike against a grabbed foe inflicts bludgeoning damage and stunned 2 (save Fortitude inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates stunning; critical failure inflicts stunned 3)
Debilitating Shot: (2) Successful ranged Strike also inflicts slowed 1 until the end of the target's next turn
Desperate Finisher: (R) Uses a press action after taking the last action in a turn, losing any further reactions until the start of the next turn
Disarming Stance: (1) Stance gives +1 to Disarm and +2 vs. Disarm, and allows Disarming foes 2 sizes larger, when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Disarming Twist: (1) Strike with a one-handed melee weapon and the other hand free inflicts Disarm on success; failure inflicts off-guard until the end of the turn
Disorienting Opening: Successful Reactive Strike inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Disruptive Stance: (1) Stance allows using Reactive Strike in response to a concentrate action, and a successful Strike disrupts it
Double Shot: (2) Makes 2 ranged Strikes against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty -2
Double Slice: (2) Makes simultaneous Strikes with 2 melee weapons at the current multiple attack penalty; a non-agile weapon on the second Strike suffers -2 attack
Dual-Handed Assault: (1) Successful melee Strike with a one-handed weapon and the other hand free inflicts additional damage, equal to its number of damage dice if it has the two-handed trait or by 1 die step otherwise
Dueling Dance: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Dueling Parry
Dueling Parry: (1) Gives +2 Armor Class until the start of the next turn when wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the other hand free
Dueling Riposte: (R) While using Dueling Parry, makes a Strike or Disarm attempt on a foe who critically fails an attack on self
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Fearsome Brute: Strikes against frightened foes inflict additional damage equal to 2x the frightened value
Felling Strike: (2) Successful Strike vs. a flying foe causes it to fall 120', and a critical success grounds it until the end of the next turn
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Flinging Charge: (2) Successful Strike with a thrown weapon during a double Stride inflicts off-guard against next self attack before the end of the turn
Flinging Shove: Successful Aggressive Block moves the target 10', or 20' on a critical success, or inflicts off-guard, and Brutish Shove moves the target 5', 10', or 20' on failure, success, or critical success
Furious Focus: Two-handed Vicious Swings count as single attacks for the multiple attack penalty
Graceful Poise: (1) Stance allows Double Slice with an agile weapon to count as 1 attack
Guardian's Deflection: (R) When wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free, gives an ally within reach +2 Armor Class vs. the triggering attack
Guiding Finish: (1) A successful Strike moves a foe 10', or 5' on failure, when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Guiding Riposte: A successful Dueling Riposte Strike moves the target 10'
Impossible Volley: (3) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty attacks all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Dueling Riposte: Gives an additional reaction to make a Dueling Riposte once per turn, even when not using Dueling Parry
Improved Twin Riposte: Gives an additional reaction to make a Twin Riposte once per turn, even when not using Twin Parry
Incredible Aim: (2) Ranged Strike gains +2 attack and ignores concealment
Incredible Ricochet: (1) Follows a ranged Strike with another against the same foe that ignores concealment and cover
Intimidating Strike: (2) Successful melee Strike inflicts frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit
Lightning Swap: (1) Stows held objects and draws 2 weapons or a shield and a weapon
Lunge: (1) Makes a melee Strike with +5' range
Lunging Stance: (1) Stance gives Reactive Strikes +5' reach
Master Of Many Styles: (F) Enters a stance at the beginning of a turn
Mirror Shield: (R) Raised shield reflects a critically failed spell attack back upon the caster, using a ranged Strike or spell attack
Mobile Shot Stance: (1) Stance allows making ranged Strikes without triggering reactions and using Reactive Strike with a loaded ranged weapon to attack an adjacent creature
Multishot Stance: (1) Stance reduces Double Shot and Triple Shot penalties to -1 and -2
Opening Stance: (F) Enters a stance during initiative
Overpowering Charge: Successful Barreling Charge moves inflict 4 HP bludgeoning, or 8 HP and off-guard until the end of the next turn on a critical hit
Overwhelming Blow: (3) Successful melee Strike counts as critical, and a natural critical gains deadly d12; counts as 3 attacks for the multiple attack penalty and leaves self stunned 1 and off-guard until the start of the next turn
Paragon's Guard: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Raise A Shield
Parting Shot: (2) Steps away from a foe and makes a ranged Strike with the target off-guard
Point Blank Stance: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 HP damage within the first range increment of a ranged non-volley weapon
Positioning Assault: (2) Successful Strike with a two-handed melee weapon moves a foe 5'
Powerful Shove: Can use Aggressive Block and Brutish Shove on foes up to 2 sizes larger, inflicting 4 HP if a shoved creature hits a barrier
Quick Reversal: (1) Makes 2 melee Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty on 2 foes flanking self; the second Strike does not increase the multiple attack penalty
Quick Shield Block: Can use an additional reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from the triggering melee Strike
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Rebounding Toss: (2) Thrown weapon makes a second Strike against a second target within 10' of the first
Revealing Stab: (2) Successful strike vs. a concealed target, or with a DC 5 flat check vs. a hidden target, leaves an embedded piercing weapon that reveals the target to others
Ricochet Stance: (1) Stance causes thrown bludgeoning and slashing weapons to return up to their listed range increment after a ranged Strike
Savage Critical: Successful attack rolls of 19 with a legendary weapon are critical successes
Shatter Defenses: (1) Successful melee Strike vs. a frightened foe inflicts off-guard while the frightened condition lasts
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Shield Warden: Can use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shielded Stride: Can Stride at half Speed with a shield raised without triggering reactions
Slam Down: (2) Follows a successful melee Strike with an Athletics check to Trip at the same multiple attack penalty
Sleek Reposition: (1) Melee Strike with a finesse or polearm weapon automatically Repositions target, or inflicts off-guard until the end of the turn on failure
Smash From The Air: Can use Cut From The Air against ranged spell attacks
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after 2 Strides
Sudden Leap: (2) Makes a melee Strike while Leaping, High Jumping, or Long Jumping up to 50'
Swipe: (2) Melee Strike attacks 2 adjacent foes
Tactical Reflexes: Gives an additional reaction to make an Reactive Strike once per turn
Triple Shot: Can use Double Shot against 1 target or use 3 actions to make 3 ranged Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty -4
Twin Parry: (1) Parrying with a melee weapon in each hand gives +1 Armor Class, or +2 Armor Class if either weapon has the parry trait, until the start of the next turn
Twin Riposte: (R) Twin Parry allows Striking or Disarming a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twinned Defense: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Twin Parry
Two-Weapon Flurry: (1) Strikes with a weapon in each hand
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 3 extra damage dice and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Weapon Supremacy: Permanently quickened; can use the additional action only to Strike
Whirlwind Strike: (3) Makes individual Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty against all foes within reach
Save: Fortitude: +29 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Battle Hardened: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Tempered Reflexes: Save Master (Reflex)
Battle Hardened: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Determination: (1) Ends a nonpermanent condition or allows a +10 counteract attempt to end a nonpermanent spell affecting self once per day
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Improved Reflexive Shield: Using Shield Block on a Reflex save protects both self and adjacent allies
Reflexive Shield: Raised shield adds its bonus to Reflex saves
Resounding Bravery: Successful Will saves give +1 saves and 10 temporary Hit Points, or +2 saves and 20 temporary Hit Points on a critical success, for 1 min
Tempered Reflexes: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 92 allocated
